txt.en: 'Hoom, it seems you are more like the Men who wear green than the tall Elves or wolf-wearing ones. I like the ones who wear green. They are my friends.\n\n'Let the Rangers know that I am no longer tired. I am full of energy and will not rest until the west of their lake is filled with peaceful nature again.'

'Ents are very curious creatures indeed...so ancient, yet we know so little. I am glad you had the pleasure of not only meeting Longbough, but of aiding him. In the dark times to come, the Ents could prove to be very valuable allies.\n\n'Now, it is time to turn our attention to the south and the city of my ancestors.'
'Hoom, another little one as a friend. More conversations like this, and I may forget how to speak treeish....'
All Quiet on the Western Front
The dark cloud over the western shores of Lake Evendim has been lifted and Longbough's spirits are high.
Orchalwë is at Tinnudir.\n\nOrchalwë will be pleased to hear the western shores of Evendim are safe.
